media.title: Cave Grave Theme (Cave Grave)
media.info: The ICONIC theme for what I consider to be my first proper game, Cave Grave, made in Chrome Music Lab, which you may have not been able to tell as it is so impressively good.

media.title: Hopping Fields (Dentopia)
media.info: A song I made for Dentopia. It wasn't included in any prototype and I don't think I even told the team I had made it. A smashing success!

media.title: Window To Space (Starry Night)
media.info: After Urso Island was cancelled, Craity wanted to turn Urso Island into a space themed game called starry night. I adapted Lazy Cafe to a space theme to get this, but the project was cancelled anyway so oh well!

media.title: Spooko (Spooky Speed) (Unused)
media.info: This didn't get added because it didn't really fit the game, and I didn't really want to make any more music so I just added ambient sounds to Spooky Speed.

media.title: Actual Good Music (D.O.G. EAT APPLE)
media.info: I made this song to practice making music and was quite happy with it. Hence the name. When I was making D.O.G. EAT APPLE I decided to reuse it for the title screen to save time.

media.title: Mealtime (D.O.G. EAT APPLE)
media.info: I had originally intended for this song to be for Birdpals, but it didn't fit in the room we wanted it to so I reused it for this!

media.title: Mealtime (D.O.G. EAT APPLE)
media.info: I had originally intended for this song to be for Birdpals, but it didn't fit in the room we wanted it to so I reused it for this!

media.title: Depressed Cat
media.info: I made this song in an attempt to learn how to make better music. Didn't work for this one, clearly.

media.title: Hiding
media.info: I made this song for a Friday Night Funkin' mod Craity was making. I think this is good but with the vocals it SUCKED. I don't have a sound file of this and the vocals but I might put them together when I can be bothered.

media.title: Peepeepoopoo
media.info: After Craity's FNF expeditions, I wondered what it would be like if I made my own FNF mod. I decided it would be against a toilet. It got cancelled but god I think this song is so funny.

media.file: Music/Misc/Misc/Song that might play in a pink room.wav
media.title: Song that Might Play in a Pink Room
media.info: I wanted to make something Box Critters-related, so I made this song based on the pink glittery cafe room they had at the time. I don't think it really fits but I think it's alright by itself. Although the timing SUCKS.

media.title: Sunshine & Saliva
media.info: I made this for a game idea I had before making the actual game. Great idea on my behalf. Craity said it sounds like a ringtone and I think I hate him now.
